name: 三国虎将传VR2
summary:
This is a three-country VR cold weapon fighting game.
The game features cold weapon fighting and level challenges, and can be battled with the bosses beyond the imagination. Compared with Sanguo Warriors VR, Sanguo Warriors VR2 system is more concise, the picture is more clear, the monster hitting feeling is improved, the level fun is increased, and the game details are more abundant.
